title: Create Highlight Clips from a Live Stream
description: During a live gaming stream, a community manager needs to create highlight clips of exciting moments to share on social media.

tasks.description: Identify a key moment in the live stream (e.g., a game-winning play).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes the timestamp of the highlight.

tasks.description: Use a clipping tool to create a 30-second video clip of the moment from the live feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the video clip.

tasks.description: Post the video clip to the company's Twitter and TikTok accounts with a relevant caption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully shares the highlight on social media.
